entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense for "sha1" is not optimal #64646
    17.5
  • The implicit operator allows converting null literal to non-nullable type without CS8600 #64638
    Backlog
  • INamedType.ToDisplayString omits delegate's parameters #64632
    17.5
  • The generate method fix in VB generates a delegate param while AddressOf is not used #64631
  • Adding a method which can add references from NuGet #64629
  • Compiler trouble due to nint/nuint and IntPtr/UIntPtr? #64628

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33011.173 #64652
  • Intellisense yield return completion #40949
    17.5
  • CS8629 false positive for nested ImmutableArray #64645
  • Convert to Struct refactoring is broken for VB #64639
  • Razor compilation fails on dotnet 6 project with 7.0.100-rc.1.22431.12 #64499
    17.4
  • Constant evaluation is not IEEE-754 compliant #64595
  • UnmanagedCallersOnly functions with bool/char parameters should be an error #64086
  • Confusing error message mentioning `WindowsRuntime` when trying to await an `IAsyncEnumerable` #64170
  • Add supporting for enumerating Embedded Resources for source generators #63941
  • Source generator exceptions should be shown as errors, rather than warnings #64175
  • Cached analyzer is applied instead of updated one #29939
    Backlog
  • Avoid reparsing on solution open #60014
  • Do we need to support RQNames for functions with function-pointer-typed arguments? #46029
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not yield the UI thread between an undo unit being created and committed #64651
    Area-IDE
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build. #64650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Save CustomAttributesBag before post decoding well known attributes. #64649
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Load CompletionProvider from references in background" #64648
    Area-IDE
  • VB ConvertTupleToStruct should not include NullableAttributes in it #64647
    Area-IDE
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Improve GenerateMethod for VB implicit call case #64635
    Area-IDE
  • Speculative semantic model - create child member models for attributes and parameter default values. #64634
    Area-Compilers
  • Expand IOperation check to lambdas #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Unskip CSharpSoruceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile test #64626
    Area-IDE
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use CWT for Task<Compilation> #64623
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • [LSP] Pass in Razor language server kind #64642
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't suggest name after unbound yield identifier #64641
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Update NuGet Package history #64643
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Include preview version when installing .NET runtime #64618
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing version #64636
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert: Revert "Set val escape on expression variables (#64414)" #64633
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis (#64470) #64619
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, OnDeckForQB, 17.4
  • Log exception directly at the point where it occurs #64637
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove lock from MAS code to prevent UI delays #64620
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Workaround crash in spellchecking in snippet layer #64622
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Set val escape on expression variables" #64627
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove TextDocumentState.sourceText #64231
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Test flaky tests #64617
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Make IPreviewService async #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Change operator when negating relational patterns with numeric values #64594
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE
  • Try add committed Suggestion item to completion MRU #64586
    Area-IDE
  • Fix early attribute decoding when an argument is interpolated string #64612
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • Set val escape on expression variables (#64414) #64621
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942
    Area-IDE
  • Name anonymous delegate parameters #64604
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't format regions inside inactive conditionals #64551
    Area-IDE, Community
